name: Overdefensive
description:
Defend the precious Octobox from a horde of pill aliens! Spend your money wisely to purchase walls and towers to construct the ultimate beach defense system!

How to Play:

  • Purchase tower bases to create a maze to slow down baddies, then top them with turrets to take them down. 
  • Turret types:
    • Red: Basic machine gun.
    • Purple: Flamethrower
    • Blue: Beach Ball Cannon
  • If an enemy reaches the Octobox, it will take damage. Don't let too many reach it!
  • Falling goo will slow you down and disable turrets. Grab the Goo Remove Drill to clear it away.
  • Goo types:
    • Green: Standard
    • Blue: Spreading
    • Red: Damages Octobox unless removed
  • Protect an area from goo with a blue Goo-Proof Umbrella.
  • If your defenses are difficult to navigate, purchase a tunnel to allow travel underneath towers. Enemies cannot travel through tunnels.

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Q - Drop held item
